entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
